title: Banco Santander global operations : geographic diversification of profit 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of attributable profit in the y axis.
The maximum Share of attributable profit 47.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at North America where Region is 16.0.
The minimum Region North America has got 2.94 times less Share of attributable profit than the maximum Region Europe.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of attributable profit for 3 number of Regions.
Region Europe has the highest Share of attributable profit and North America has the lowest Share of attributable profit.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of attributable profit in the y axis.
The maximum Share of attributable profit 47.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at North America where Region is 16.0.
The minimum Region North America has got 2.94 times less Share of attributable profit than the maximum Region Europe.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
Region Europe has the highest Share of attributable profit and North America has the lowest Share of attributable profit.
The second highest Share of attributable profit is appeared to be the Region South America.
There is a difference of 31.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region North America.
Considered together, the average Share of attributable profit in all 3 Regions is roughly 33.33.
